title: Drawing, Design for "Voodoo for Peace" Screen, Reverse Side, ca. 1985
title_raw: Design for "Voodoo for Peace" Screen, Reverse Side
inscribed: In graphite, upper-right corner encircled number 2; upper half right margin square with "=2"; center right margin "W;" lower right margin, brass hinges; lower right corner, 10, other numbers and mathematical notations scattered in right margin.
description: Four panel screen in form of four abstract figures drawn in contour. Upper healf of figures in blocky, angular shapes with each triangular shape inscribed on end. Lower half of figures described as "skirt" shapes with horizontal lines drawn on lower half.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for "Voodoo for Peace" Screen, Reverse Side, ca. 1985. Graphite on graph paper.. 
Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-505
